price: 5. Tonna hinnay a-koros Qhuraan kee Nabii dirabbosseh keenih yemeete waqdi, edde luk usun tobollokime (yengeggele) caagidih addat yanin qhuraan kee Nabiik iyyaanamak.
arabic: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِيٓ أَمۡرٖ مَّرِيجٍ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: bal kadhabū bil-ḥaqi lammā jāahum fahum fī amrin marījin
